subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Please take your negative remarks off this group to private emails
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-420542754-1184515722=:44282
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Just a note to remind everyone we arent here to argue we are here to research together. So if you have negative remarks to make to each other or discussions which should be done in private take them off this group to private emails. We dont need the negativity here it interferes with the work we are trying to do and wont be tolerated.

  Nobody is better than anyone else or less worthy for contact than anyone else. 
   
  Misty
   
   

 
---------------------------------
